pet.name: Als Pals Pet Place
pet.information: Each month our box will have the highest quality treats, great toys, and a surprise.  There will be a different theme each month as well.  A monthly subscription is $30.00 a month.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.
pet.paragraph1: Each month our box will have the highest quality treats, great toys, and a surprise.  There will be a different theme each month as well.

box of the week.name: The Land of Storybooks
box of the week.information: The Land of Storybooks has everything you need for a meaningful time of connection with your child.  You will receive a novel, two arts and crafts projects, an adventure guide, a sealed letter for your child, and a digital download.  A monthly subscription is $39.95 a month.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

male-baby.name: What a Babe! Kids Studio
male-baby.information: From the popular L.A. kids studio,bring our beloved Magic Touch sensory class home.  Watch your little one light up with delight as they squish, crinkle, and splat!  A monthly subcription is $49.00 a month.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

male-child.name: My Pre-K Box
male-child.information: Delight your preschooler with fresh new themes each month! My Pre-K box deliver early childhood eductor and mom created, play-based Pre-K curriculum to your front door.  A monthly subscription is $40.00 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $38.88 a month, totaling $115.00, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $35.83 a month, totaling $215.00, twice a year.  For more information, go to www.myprekbox.com.

male-teen.name: Mascot Monthly Box
male-teen.information: Mascot Monthly Box is the only Japanese snack box that is curated by friendly mascot characters.  Take a monthly taste-tour of Japan wiht local specialities form their hometown, and share a bite of some of the weird and wonderful snacks that they love.  A monthly subscription is $38.50 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $37.00 a month, totaling $111.00, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $35.50 a month, totaling $219.00, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $35.50 a month, totaling $426.00, once a year.  For more information, www.mascotmix.com.

male-adult.name: Cheesy Academy
male-adult.information: If you love learning about cheese and tasting interesting new finds, this subscription is for you.  Cheesy Academy sends you cheese tastings, pairings, and drink kits.  A monthly subscription is $105.00 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $100.00 a month, totaling $300.00, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $100.00 a month, totaling $600.00, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $90.00 a month, totaling $1080.00, once a year.  For more information, go to cheesyacademy.com.

female-baby.information: Give your little one the gift of reading.  Our monthly reaching readers book boxes each contain two padded board books and one novelty book. female-child.information: Mail just got more fun with this subscription box for creative kids wo love crayons. female-teen.name: Thoughts of Joy
female-teen.information: A subscription box for girls and women who live to be created and want to grow in their faith.  Each box contains two handmade craft kits pluss all the tools and supplies needed to complete the crafts.  We also include a set of matching Bible verse art prints.  A monthly subscription is $40.00 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $38.00 a month, totaling $114.00, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $36.50 a month, totaling $219.00, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $35.00 a month, totaling $420.00, once a year.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

neutral-child.name: Konnect Kraze
neutral-child.information: A quarterly box for children with autism and special needs created by a Speech Pathologist! Includes speech/language activities, sensory toys/tools and resources that will make it easier to have fun at home with your child and family.  For a quarterly subscription, it's $64.95 a box.  For an annual subscription, it's $61.20 a box, totaling $244.80, once a year.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

neutral-teen.name: Snackboon
neutral-teen.information: Personalize your Snackboon with healthy and premium snacks to switch to healthier enjoyment for your teen.  We obtain a list of your preferred snacks at a time of subscription, curate your favorites from different suppliers and offer a full and personalized snacks at your doorstep.  A monthly subscription is $26.99 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $26.00 a month, totaling $77.99, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $25.00 a month, totaling $149.99, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $24.00 a month, totaling $287.99, once a year.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

neutral-adult.name: Desk Stash
neutral-adult.information: Desk Stash is a curated collection of unique office supplies and desk accessories we have tested and we love.  The gole of Desk Stash is to inspire you to work more creatively, and have fun while doing it.  For 1 box over 3 months, it's $45.00 a box, every 3 months.  For 2 boxes over 6 months, it's $45 a box, totaling $90, twice a year.  For 4 boxes over 12 months, it's $42.00 a box, totaling $170.00, once a year.  For more information, go to www.deskstash.com.
